title: vaDa pazhani tigazhum
sahitya:
vaDa pazhani tigazhum vaDivElan magizhavE aDi tozhuvOr paDum iDarODi maraiyumE


anupallavi

  paDi tanil tannuDaiya bhaktar inbamuravE kaDaikkan aruLAl kaDait-tETri varum


caraNam    tuDittiDavE tunbam koDuttiDum innal tuDaittiDuvaduDan tuyar Edum inimEl
aDuttu vandiDAdu aNaindu annai pOl Adarittu vandiDum jyOti svarUpanAga
